attributes.action: give enviromental health officers the power to stop unlicenced tattooing from private houses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: enviromental health officers should be given the power to stop anyone tattooing from a private house without a licence. most of these people do not have any idea about hygene or sterilization or tattooing people under the legal age of 18 years(Tattooing of minors Act)

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "give enviromental health officers the power to stop unlicenced tattooing from private houses."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13054.asp

Prime Minister's Office
